query:
SELECT t.id, t.titulo, t.estado, t.reuniaoId, DATE(r.data) as dataReuniao, DATE(t.createdAt) as criado
FROM topicos_reuniao_gestores t 
LEFT JOIN reunioes_gestores r ON t.reuniaoId = r.id 
WHERE t.estado = 'analisado' AND t.reuniaoId IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY r.data DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT t.id, t.titulo, t.estado, t.reuniaoId, DATE(r.data) as dataReuniao, DATE(t.createdAt) as criado
FROM topicos_reuniao_gestores t 
LEFT JOIN reunioes_gestores r ON t.reuniaoId = r.id 
WHERE t.estado = 'analisado' AND t.reuniaoId IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY r.data DESC;
